Product Description

Sri Sri Ayurveda Bhringamlakadi Taila is a medicated oil prepared from a combination of exquisite herbs. It nourishes the hair root and makes the hair long and strong. Regular use of this oil reduces hair fall prevents premature graying gives a silky texture and adds a natural black shine to hair. It is also known to improve vision and decrease headache.
